about.title: About Me
about.paragraph: I’m a bilingual Spanish-English programmer with experience in C#, Python, and modern web technologies. Alongside software development, I bring hands-on expertise in fiber optics and structured cabling, bridging the gap between software and fieldwork.
skills: Coding expertise in C#, Python, Java, and web technologies
Modern front-end work with WPF, .NET Core 9.0, and Tailwind
Fiber optics splicing, RJ45 crimping, structured networking
Fieldwork in electronic installations and automation
